title: 新约 - 约翰贰书(2 John) - 第 1 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 约翰贰书(2 John) -- 第 1 章 ( 本篇共有 1 章 )

lineList.en: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;
lineList.cn: 作长老的写信给蒙拣选的太太，（太太作教会下同），和他的儿女，就是我诚心所爱的。不但我爱，也是一切知道真理之人所爱的。

lineList.en: For the truth's sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.
lineList.cn: 爱你们是为真理的缘故，这真理存在我们里面，也必永远与我们同在。

lineList.en: Grace be with you, mercy, and peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
lineList.cn: 恩惠，怜悯，平安，从父神和他儿子耶稣基督，在真理和爱心上，必常与我们同在。

lineList.en: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.
lineList.cn: 我见你的儿女，有照我们从父所受之命令遵行真理的，就甚欢喜。

lineList.en: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
lineList.cn: 太太阿，我现在劝你，我们大家要彼此相爱。这并不是我写一条新命令给你，乃是我们从起初所受的命令。

lineList.en: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.
lineList.cn: 我们若照他的命令行，这就是爱。你们从起初所听见当行的，就是这命令。

lineList.en: For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.
lineList.cn: 因为世上有许多迷惑人的出来，他们不认耶稣基督是成了肉身来的。这就是那迷惑人的，敌基督的。

lineList.en: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.
lineList.cn: 你们要小心，不要失去你们（有古卷作我们）所作的工，乃要得着满足的赏赐。

lineList.en: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.
lineList.cn: 凡越过基督教训，不常守着的，就没有神。常守这教训的，就有父又有子。

lineList.en: If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not into your house, neither bid him God speed:
lineList.cn: 若有人到你们那里，不是传这教训，不要接他到家里，也不要问他的安。

lineList.en: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.
lineList.cn: 因为问他安的，就在他的恶行上有分。

lineList.en: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.
lineList.cn: 我还有许多事要写给你们，却不愿意用纸墨写出来。但盼望到你们那里，与你们当面谈论，使你们的喜乐满足。

lineList.en: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
lineList.cn: 你那蒙拣选之姐妹的儿女都问你安。
